content.question: The author’s contrast between “persistence” and “stubbornness” advances her argument in which of the following ways?

choices.label: It helps explain why habit is more valuable than persistence.
It challenges the stereotype that talented writers are often stubborn.
It concedes that persistence can have negative consequences.
It underscores the need for writers to continually improve their craft.

content.answer: It underscores the need for writers to continually improve their craft.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
